title.rendered: Keeping WordPress and Bootstrap Websites Up To Date

content.rendered:
Why is keeping your website up to date so important?

When it comes to managing your website, there are some factors that require general maintenance. Though the average company will likely take actions towards keeping the content on their website relevant, people have a tendency to forget the technology side of website management. If you are the proud owner of a stunning WordPress website, chances are that you think that once the website has been built, your work is done. In reality, maintaining your website is incredibly important. In order to keep your WordPress website up to date, you will need to continuously update the WordPress core and plugins. If you aren’t comfortable doing this, WordPress website maintenance services might be a good option for you. In this article, we will explain why it is so important to keep your website up to date.

Keeping your website secure

The biggest factor that you will want to consider when it comes to ensuring that the technology behind your website is up to date is security. WordPress and plugin developers frequently carry out updates to the core and plugins to ensure that your website is up to date when it comes to security features. Regardless of whether or not you are running a website that manages sensitive data, keeping your website secure is imperative. This will help you to avoid issues with hackers or potential malware that might impact your clients. There is simply no excuse for a company that doesn’t take appropriate steps to protect their customers. Though accidents will happen, you don’t want it to be over a simple oversight like this. It is your job to protect your customers and yourself for the sake of your company’s credibility. A good Calgary website development company will ensure that your WordPress site is always up to date, backed up, and secure. If you want to find out more regarding our backup and update procedures, feel free to reach out to Clio Websites.

How updates impact website performance

In addition to ensuring that your website remains secure, these updates can actually impact quite a bit about how your website runs. Many of these updates involve details that can impact the way that your website acts and functions. Failing to manage these updates can lead to unwanted problems for your website. It might take longer to load or, in a worst case scenario, might stop working entirely. Maintaining your website is important to keep it running well and looking great. When you manage these updates appropriately, you can enjoy a website experience that works as well on day one as it does three years later. The last thing that you want is to lose business because an important button on your website stopped working or a prominent page suddenly became inaccessible. WordPress websites tend to slow down after some time due to adding content and functionality to the website. Keeping core and plugins up to date will ensure that your website performs well and is quick to load when clients visit in order to find out more about your business or purchase products.

How can Clio help you with website maintenance

Not everyone who owns a website feels completely comfortable with the technology side of it, and that is okay. With WordPress website maintenance services, you can work with an external company to easily manage your website. This will help give you peace of mind regarding the security and continuous quality of your website. At Clio, we are a professional web design company that also manages WordPress and HTML websites for a low monthly fee. Feel free to contact us to see how we can help you to keep your site running. Our team is always here to help you get the most out of your website. We are Calgary WordPress experts and can help you maintain and expand your current website project.
